name: Shroom Island
description:
Shroom Island
Ludum Dare 38

Shroom Island is a game where you have to survive in a small game world which is very hostile.

Recommended default controls:

W;A;S;D - Movement

Shift - Run

Space - Attack

F - Build "Healer" (require 5 resource points)

This was our first game jam and it was fun as hell! :D

best regards

Team CodeCaveHH
